code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,LineElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(LineElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const SensorChart=_ref=>{let{data,label}=_ref;const chartData={labels:data.map(entry=>new Date(entry.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString()),datasets:[{label,data:data.map(entry=>entry.value),fill:true,borderColor:'red',color:'red',tension:1}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData});};export default SensorChart;
